document_data.mainbody:
Fuirgar, also called the Land of the Stone Giants, was the name given to a small mountain range and surrounding lowland found in the Hordelands and east Faer√ªn.
Fuirgar was located on the northern side of Rolling Stone Gap across from the Giants Belt Mountains. It was bordered to the east by the Raurin desert, and the the west and north by the Dragonsword Mountains.
This mountain ranges epithet was derived from the fact that hundreds of stone giants inhabited the area.
